==Applies To==
* PCI DSS Requirement 3.3
==Policy Statement==
Mask displayed PANs.
==Policy Purpose==
PANs are very sensitive. Displaying them on the screen or on print-outs is unacceptable.
==Related Guidance==
* [[c7825052-f281-4ac8-a786-41b776219af6|Mask All Password Fields]]
==Related Checklist Items==
* [[bfadd27f-8ade-45cb-8b3d-6e53ff319ed8|All Password Fields Are Masked]]
